title: I Couldn’t Ask - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Betrayal   Complex Family Relationships   Death of Loved Ones   Female Protagonist   Imperial Harem   Male Yandere   Obsessive Love   Pregnancy   Schemes And Conspiracies   Yandere
author: 李悦芽
description:
The man I saved destroyed my country with his own hands.

I still remembered the day when I was given the title “Consort Yu” and my husband was kneeling outside of the palace for the night.

It happened to be New Year’s Eve that day, and there was a heavy snowfall.

Xu Tangan told me that he would treat me better than anyone else.

–

I could seek his power and status, but I must not seek his love.>
